author: jvanzyl
msg: o Adding some information to the log when the method invocation fails and
additionally grab the properties of the bean and spit them out so we
can see what's set and what's not set. This let me figure out what was
wrong with a bunch of dynamic maven jelly beans. Shouldn't cost anything
as it only occurs when the invocation fails.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for setting variables in different scopes, such as 'parent', 'application', 'session' and so forth.

author: jstrachan
msg: Removed unnecessary methods getScopedVariable() and setScopedVariable().
Also provided support for 'scopes' such as {parent, application, session, request} and so forth.

author: jstrachan
msg: removed use of unnecessary getScopedVariable() so that JellyContext.getVariable() is used instead

author: werken
msg: Added special case for InvocationTargetException unwrapping.
